inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent prior to study participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adults who are contractually capable and mentally able to understand and follow the instructions of the study personnel.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Missing informed consent prior to study participation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has been committed to an institution by legal or regulatory order
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Persons in dependence from the sponsor or working with the sponsor
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in another clinical trial within the previous 2 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath. He has COPD and smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
